problem_names: lemma t\<^sub>pt: "t\<^sub>p s q a + 1 = t s q a"
translations: lemma t\<^sub>pt: "t\<^sub>p s q a + 1 = t s q a"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. t\<^sub>p s q a + 1 = t s q a

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (let (mf, sws) = a in index (swaps sws s) q + length sws) + 1 =
    (let (mf, sws) = a in index (swaps sws s) q + 1 + length sws)
